description: This table contains discrete social history items.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SOH_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference identifier associated with the social history.

columns.name: SOH_TYPE_ID_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the type of current social history information.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Smoking Status


Tobacco Use


Cigarette Packs Per Day


Cigarette Pack Years


Tobacco Cessation


Sexually Active


Pregnancy


Smokeless Status


Social Connections Phone


Social Connections Get Together


Social Connections Church


Social Connections Meetings


Social Connections Membership


Physical Activity DPW


Physical Activity MPS


Stress


Education


Financial


IPV Emotional


IPV Fear


IPV Sexual Abuse


IPV Physical Abuse


Alcohol Frequency


Alcohol Std Drinks


Alcohol Binge


Social Connections Living


Tobacco Comment


Alcohol Comment


Food Worry


Food Scarcity


Transport Med


Transport Non-Med


Birth Control


Sexual Partner


History of Alcohol Use


Alcoholic Drinks Per Day


Substance Use Status


Abused Substance


Frequency of Drug Misuse


Travel History


Communicable Disease Exposure


Housing Unable to Pay


Housing Places Lived


Housing Homeless Last Year


Sexual Orientation


Gender Identity

columns.name: SOH_START_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the start date of social history information.

columns.name: SOH_END_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the end date of social history information.

columns.name: SOH_CODE_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the name of code which is associated with social history information.

columns.name: SOH_SMOK_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the smoking status information within social history.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Every Day


Some Days


Smoker, Current Status Unknown


Former


Never


Never Assessed


Passive Smoke Exposure - Never Smoker


Unknown


Heavy Smoker


Light Smoker

columns.name: SOH_TOBACCO_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the tobacco types information within social history.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cigarettes


Pipe


Cigars


Snuff


Chew

columns.name: SOH_PREG_EDD_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the estimated date of delivery within social history.

columns.name: SOH_VALUE
columns.description: This item stores the value string of social history information.

columns.name: SOH_SEX_ACTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the sexually active status within social history.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


Never


Not Asked


Not Currently


Defer

columns.name: SOH_SOURCE_DXR_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the received document that contains this this social history information.

columns.name: SOH_SMOKELESS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores smokeless tobacco use information within social history.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Current


Former


Never


Unknown

columns.name: SOH_RECORDED_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the recorded date of social history information.

columns.name: SOH_TRAVEL_GEO_REGION_ID
columns.description: The geographic region to which the patient has traveled associated with this social history.

columns.name: SOH_TRAVEL_GEO_REGION_ID_GEO_REGION_NAME
columns.description: The record name for the geographical region record.
